name: tm23
effect: Teaches Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is slammed with a sturdy tail of steel. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat if it hits.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is slammed with a sturdy tail of steel. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat if it hits.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The foe is slammed with a sturdy tail of steel. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat if it hits.
